workflow.name: Rss feed reader that saves the feeds of the last 3 days in Google Sheets
workflow.description:
++**How it Works:**++
This RSS reader retrieves links from a Google Sheets file and goes through each link to retrieve the messages that are younger than 3 days, then saves them in a second Google Sheets file and then deletes all older entries in the second Google Sheets file!

***==The retrieval can take a while due to the Google API block prevention, depending on the number of news feeds that were retrieved!==***

***Detailed Description is in the sticky Notes from the Workflow!***

parameters.content: ## Timer starts the Update every 24 hours and Read the Links out of a Google Sheets File (RSS-Links)
## Each individual link is scanned and retrieved
## Everything older than 3 days is removed
## Each entry is saved individually with a waiting time in the Google Sheets file (RSS-Feeds), the waiting time is necessary as Google Sheets would otherwise receive too many hits and block access!
## Reading the saved entries in the Google Sheets file (RSS-Feeds)
## Everything that is younger than 3 days will be removed, as we only want to delete the older entries!
## All entries older than 3 days are deleted here, again with a timer to prevent a Google API block! (RSS-Feeds)
